content:
@Michel Rutten We are trying to build a derived profile for SDC. SDC contains several extensions on Questionnaire.useContext with valueCodeableConcept and an example binding. We are trying to constrain the context-user slice from an example binding to an extensible binding on a specific ValueSet.

Forge flags this a warning with this message
Message : Invalid binding strength. Value must be equal to or stricter than base value.

Forge does not warn when we switch to binding "required". Is this a known issue in Forge 19.7 for STU3 or is this correct behavior?
Hi Alexander, I'd like to investigate this issue. Is it possible to share the relevant (draft) structures?
Sent through PM. :+1:

I can't reproduce the issue?
pasted image
I can also bump the binding strength in derived profile nl-code-questionnaire without validation warnings.
